channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: President Joe Biden Threatens 2024 Election Won’t Be ‘Peaceful’
item.description: Biden’s comments come roughly 24 hours before Trump returns to the site of his first failed assassination attempt in Butler, Pennsylvania.

item.title: 'Massive failure:' Speaker Johnson rips Biden administration's hurricane response
item.description: House Speaker Mike Johnson slammed the Biden administration for the "massive failure" in its response to Hurricane Helene.

item.title: Cotton calls Jack Smith a 'deranged fanatic' over election-season filing
item.description: Sen. Tom Cotton slammed the unsealed legal brief of special counsel Jack Smith regarding his 2020 election interference case against former President ...

item.title: SCOTUS kicks off historic term under scrutiny amid ethics code debate
item.description: The U.S. Supreme Court is back in session with elections and ethics among the high-profile decisions on the docket.

item.title: For Trump, Butler is now a powerful symbol of both his 2024 campaign and his life
item.description: For his supporters, Donald Trump's triumphant return Saturday to the site where a would-be assassin's bullet came within inches of ending his life per...

item.title: Four Michiganders Charged After Allegedly Voting Twice
item.description: Democrat Attorney General Dana Nessel announced Friday that her office filed felony charges against four Michigan residents who allegedly double-voted...

item.title: Garvey says Republicans can again overcome national 'malaise'
item.description: Baseball great Steve Garvey -- a Republican -- is running for the U.S. Senate in California. His Democratic opponent in the race is Rep. Adam Schiff. ...

item.title: Modern Halloween Celebrations Are Spiritually Empty

item.title: Early voting begins in California, Texas, 5 other states
item.description: California, Texas and several other states began their early voting processes on Monday.

item.title: With the World in Turmoil, Biden and Harris Focus the Defense Department on . . . Global Warming
item.description: From woodpecker conservation to electric tanks, Democrats are prioritizing eco-grift over national defense.

item.title: Arizona Supreme Court Green-Lights Ranked-Choice Voting Ballot Initiative Riddled With Duplicate Signatures
item.description: 'What the AZ Supreme Court just affirmed is that as long as you can conceal your cheating long enough, you can fraud your way onto the ballot.'

item.title: Democrats Bitten Once More by Debate Overconfidence
item.description: After first talking up Biden’s abilities and then smearing Vance as an incoherent weirdo, they watched the debates unravel all of their spin.

item.title: Battleground Senate candidate unloads on 'radical' Dem opponent for disparaging Trump voters
item.description: Arizona GOP Senate candidate Kari Lake spoke to Fox News Digital about why she believes her opponent, Rep. Ruben Gallego, is not a "moderate" candidat...

item.title: Complaints Ask FEC, FCC To Investigate ABC For Breaking Broadcast And Donation Rules In Debate
item.description: Broadcasters must present debates in the public interest, and corporations can't donate to campaigns.

item.title: How to Fight the Left’s Politicization of Medicine
item.description: A new study challenges one of the more popular reasons cited for introducing left-wing ideology into the medical field.

item.title: Are Dems Slow-Walking Hurricane Relief To Suppress An Election-Deciding Number Of GOP Voters?
item.description: A slow-rolled disaster response in North Carolina has many wondering if Democrats are trying to suppress votes in the Trump-supporting region.

item.title: Can Birth Really Be ‘Free’?
item.description: The ‘Make Birth Free’ movement falls for the progressive fantasy that any problem can be solved if the government throws enough money at it.

item.title: Senate Republicans mark Oct 7 attack 1 year out as Israel-Hamas war continues
item.description: Senate Republicans issued a renewed condemnation of the Oct. 7, 2023, terrorist attacks perpetrated by Hamas in Israel one year after they occurred.

item.title: How important is Wisconsin? Trump's now visited 4 times in 8 days
item.description: Donald Trump on Sunday visited Wisconsin for the fourth time in eight days as his campaign showers attention on a pivotal state where Republicans fret...
